All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Advance
Class containing logic for implementation of Advance command If the target territory belongs to the same player, army units are moved to the target territory.
Airlift
Class containing logic for the implementation of the Airlift order
Blockade
Class containing logic for implementation of Blockade order Blockade cards change one of your territories to a neutral and multiply the number of armies on that territory by 3 times.
Bomb
Class containing logic for implementation of BOMB order
Continent
The `Continent` class encapsulates information about continents, including their name, ID.
Country
This class represents country object that consists of country name, continent it resides in and its neighbouring countries.
Deploy
class contains the logic for the deploy order functionality
EngineCommand
This class contains implementation of all the actions defined by the game
ExecuteOrders
class performs execute orders functionality
GameCard
This class is the entity class that represents "Card" that needs to be assigned to players once they conquer any country
GameEngine
This class manages game phases, player actions, and map editing.
GameGraph
The GameGraph class is responsible for creating, validating and analyzing the game map.
GameMapView
This class is responsible for showing the map.
GamePhase
GamePhases is an enum of the several phases that the game moves through As per the Warzone project description we have defined the phases
GamePlay
GamePlay is the entry point of the program and is the view that is presented to the players It calls the controller GameEngine to issue the commands passed by the player
GetCommands
Provides methods to validate and retrieve user commands based on the current game phase.
IssueOrderPhase
Class containing logic for implementation of IssueOrder Phase
LoadGraph
Handles loading and parsing game map data from a file.
LogEntry
The LogEntry class stores log entries related to the game state.
LogWriter
class to implement the logging of events to a log file.
MainPlay
Class containing logic for implementation of MainPlay that is implementation of State Pattern
MapEditorLoad
Concrete Implentation of the MapEditor.
MapEditorPhase
This is the implementation of the Map Edit phase of the game.
Negotiate
Negotiate class implements the Diplomacy card Diplomacy card enforces peace between two players for a variable number of turns.
Observable
for performing operations including adding, removing, and informing observers.
Observer
For notifying the observing classes when it receives a notification from the Observable.
Order
class performs execute orders functionality
Phase
This is the State interface that contains the methods that will change their behaviour depending on the type of the state it is in.
Play
Implementation of the Play Phase
Player
Class representing a player in a game.
ReinforcePlayers
Handles tasks related to Assign_Reinforcement Phase which assigns armies according to WarZone rules.
StartUp
Class containing logic for implementation of StartUp that is implementation of State Pattern
TestAdvanceOnly
Test Class for confirming functionality of the advance order when the other country is owned by the player
TestAdvanceWithAttack
Test Class to test functionality of the attack order when other country is not owned by the player
TestAirlift
Test AirLift operation for a specific player in Game
TestBlockade
Test blockade operation for a specific player in Game
TestBomb
Test bomb operation for a specific player in Game
TestCard
Test Class to checks whether card is getting added or not.
TestCardRemoval
Test Class to validate removal of card assigned to the player
TestContinent
To test the functionalities carried out related to Continents
TestCountry
To test the functionalities carried out related to Country
TestCountryAssignment
Tests if countries are assigned properly or not
TestDiplomacy
Test Class for diplomacy card working properly or not.
TestDisconnectedContinent
Tests case where a continent subgraph is disconnected
TestGameWin
Test if given player has won the game
TestIsCountryAdjacent
Tests whether target country is neighbour to one of current player's country
TestIssueOrderPhase
Test Issue Order phase under State Pattern
TestMapEdit
Test if a new map can be created or existing map can be edited.
TestMapLoad
Test if the map is loading or not
TestNeighbor
Test if neighbours are being added and removed properly or not
TestNeutralCountry
Test case to confirm if country is turned Neurtal
TestNotANeighbour
Test whether a territory is not a neighbour for given player
TestNumberOfArmies
Tests if Reinforcements are assigned properly or not
TestObserverPattern
Test class to confirm if observer pattern is working as intended That is if LogEntry(observable) updates the LogWriter(observer) and if it writes to log file log.txt
TestOrderAddition
Tests if addition of orders works
TestOrderRemoval
Tests if the removal of orders works
TestPlayerRemoved
Tests if a specific player was removed from the Game
TestRemoveContinent
To test the removal of continent
TestStatePattern
Test case to validate state pattern by checking if phase state is running properly or not
TestSuite
 
TestValidateMap
Tests if map is validated or not
ValidateMap
Validation of map takes place in this class
WargameMap
Represents a wargame map containing continents and countries.
